info.+content: All children dream to have a friend straight from a fairy tale... A little boy opens his closet and finds a strange creature with a parasol sitting in there. Nobody knows how he got there and from what mysterious worlds he is, but it is a fast friendship from the beginning. And nobody can ever know...

title.+content: O mise ya san, hen bee
Gori ta no himitsu wo sagure
Fushigi no kuni kara chō ga kita
Bokura no kadan ha hana ippai
Nuki tsu nuka retsu dai sessen
